holidays.title: National Make Your Bed Day
holidays.description: Did you know that we spend a third of our lives in bed?

holidays.title: Patriot Day
holidays.description: A time to reflect on the devastating 9/11 terror attacks that took nearly 3,000 lives.

holidays.title: IRONMAN Wales
holidays.description: Explore every intriguing and heart-racing detail of the world’s most daring endurance course.

holidays.title: Libraries Remember Day
holidays.description: Libraries are a treasure trove of knowledge and some of our most joyful memories.

holidays.title: National Boss/Employee Exchange Day
holidays.description: Get ready to step into a different pair of shoes as we celebrate this fun day.

holidays.title: National Hot Cross Bun Day
holidays.description: You know what’s for breakfast today!

holidays.title: No News is Good News Day
holidays.description: Explore the benefits of unplugging from the world on No News is Good News Day

holidays.title: Angeline Varona’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fashion model and social media influencer is one post away from irrevocable fame.

holidays.title: Ginger Minj’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits to Ginger Minj's artistic talent. Celebrate their special day today!

holidays.title: Jc Caylen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Being an all-rounder, Jc Caylen is one of the most notable names in the YouTube world.

holidays.title: Kygo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kygo is not only a talented artist but also a dedicated philanthropist and all-around star.

holidays.title: Ludacris’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented rapper and actor, not even the sky can limit him.

holidays.title: Taraji P. Henson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress has created a legacy that will stand the test of time.

holidays.title: Yukiko Todoroki’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress can rest in peace knowing her talents made the world brighter and more beautiful.
